description: This object describes the core fields for a project
title: project_core

^characteristics_.*$.description: Fields that begin with characteristics_ can contain any value, and the field name can be anything after the prefix

project_id.description: A unique ID for this project.

name.description: A short, descriptive name for the project that need not be unique.

description.description: A general description of the project.

contributors.description: List of people contributing to the project.

items.description: A short description of overall experiment type. e.g. "single cell RNA sequencing."

experimental_factor_name.description: A list of the factors that vary between samples in the experiment. e.g. "time since collection", "preservation method"

insdc_project.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) project accession. Can be from the DDBJ, EMBL-EBI, or NCBI. Accession must start with DRP, ERP, or SRP.

insdc_study.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) study accession. Can be from the DDBJ, EMBL-EBI, or NCBI. Accession must start with PRJE, PRJN, or PRJD

related_projects.description: A list of other projects that may be logically grouped with this one.

submitters.description: List of people submitting data to the project.

supplementary_files.description: Project-level supplementary files. e.g. experimental design documents, lab spreadsheets, manuscripts in preparation.
